select idFuncionario as ID,
       sCodigoFuncionario as CODIGO,
       sNomeFuncionario AS NOME,
       sApelidoFuncionario as APELIDO,
       sdescricao AS DEPARTAMENTO,
       sCpf AS CPF,
       sRg AS RG,
       sEstadiCivil AS ESTADO_CIVIL,
       sProfissao AS PROFISSAO,
       sNaturalidade as NATURALIDADE,
       sNacionalidade AS NACIONALIDADE,
       sSexo as SEXO,
       dDataCadastro AS DATA_CADASTRO,
       sEndereco AS ENDERECO,
       sNumero   AS NUMERO,
       sComplemento AS COMPLEMENTO,
       sCep AS CEP,
       sBairro AS BAIRRO,
       scidade AS CIDADE,
       idMunicipio AS CODIGO_MUNICIPIO,
       sMunicipio AS MUNICIPIO,
       sUF AS UF,
       sEmailFuncionario AS EMAIL,
       sFoneResidencial AS FONE_RESIDENCIAL,
       sCelular AS CELULAR,
       sFoneContato AS CONTATO,
       dDataAniversario AS ANIVERSARIO,
       sStatus,
       sIndicadopor AS INDICADO_POR,
       sObs AS OBS,
       sFoto,
       F.idDepartamento,
       F.idEndereco as idEndereco
from tbfuncionarios F
left join tbendereco E on F.idEndereco = E.idEndereco
LEFT JOIN tbdepartamento D ON F.idDepartamento = D.idDepartamento
